blocked_params_descr.message: Case-sensitive parameters that will be removed from the URL. Use param@domain.com to use domain-specific blocked parameters. Use a comma as the delimiter between blocked parameters.

icon_animation_descr.message: Animation to use when Neat URL is cleaning up the URL.

icon_theme_descr.message: Dark icons are used by default. You can change this option to use light icons.

icon_theme_dark_notiflight.message: Use dark icons except for notifications

icon_theme_light_notifdark.message: Use light icons except for notifications

show_counter_descr.message: Show a counter which displays the number of rewritten URLs.

counter_background_color_descr.message: The background color used by the counter.

enable_logging_descr.message: Log URL changes to the browser console.

blacklist_descr.message: Comma separated list of domains. Neat URL will not work on these websites.

url_request_types_descr.message: Default value: main_frame. This list is comma-separated. Valid values can be found in the the list of resource types.
url_request_types_descr.description: Please leave the link intact. You can translate the normal text and the text 'the list of resource types'. The link must not be changed. main_frame must also stay the same.
